sources.name: MoviesDB
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  MoviesDB

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared MoviesDB = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://tutorialstorageacsilva.dfs.core.windows.net/sample-data/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = MoviesDB,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"Rotton Tomato", type number}}),
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Changed column type", "%Rotton", each [Rotton Tomato] / 100),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Added custom", each [year] > 0)
in
  #"Filtered rows";
